name: Core Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of a professional social networking platform intended to build professional identity and connection for the digital economy. . The company's platform provides launching of a new venture, learning a new skill, working towards a promotion or career milestone and closing of deal, enabling entrepreneurs to progress in less time, learn faster and cultivate powerful professional identities.
